name: Happy new year!
body:
### 2014 was a busy year for open government data, so we decided to summarise it in a simple word cloud:
![word cloud] (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/morchickit/opengov-working-group.github.io/master/images/Screen%20Shot%202014-12-19%20at%2012.12.17.png) 

### As 2015 is coming upon us, we want to have our own new year resolution: more topics, more sharing, more knowledge spread around. So we will all have even more open governments in the year to come.

### We have started to think of new ways to make this community even more vibrant, stay tuned for more info in the next week!

### Thank you all for sharing your updates with us, and we hope to hear from you even more in 2015.  

## Happy and open 2015!
Mor and the friends at Open Knowledge
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
